5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if it works

                        </includes>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.20.1</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <skipTests>${skip.integration.tests}</skipTests>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>

                            </goals>
                        </execution>

                                </tasks>
                            </configuration>
                            <goals>

                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.6</version>
                    <configuration>

                        </descriptors>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.10.4</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                    <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <!-- Broken since 1.4.0 - does not include my classes in the uber jar :-( -->
                    <!--<version>1.5.2.RELEASE</version>-->
                    <version>1.3.6.RELEASE</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>

                                <goal>repackage</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>
